text.large-chatlog-warning: Due to large chatlog, some settings will apply on next reload.
text.maybe-reload: Some changes might require a reload.

theme.name: Theme Settings
theme.label: Configure Theme Settings
theme.hint: Change theme settings for various applications and UI elements. The D&D 5e theme relies on assets from the D&D 5e system, so it should be installed as well.

application-theme.name: Application theme
application-theme.hint: Affected by 'Core ‚Üí User Interface Configuration ‚Üí Application' color scheme.

interface-theme.name: Interface theme
interface-theme.hint: Affected by 'Core ‚Üí User Interface Configuration ‚Üí Interface' color scheme.

chat-message-standard-theme.name: Chat message (standard) theme
chat-message-standard-theme.hint: Applies to messages from speakers not from the 'opposition' alliance.

chat-message-opposition-theme.name: Chat message (opposition) theme
chat-message-opposition-theme.hint: Applies to messages with speakers from the 'opposition' alliance.

border-radius.name: Roundedness
border-radius.hint: (default: 3px) Changes the degree of roundedness in many UI elements.

sheet-theme-color.name: Sheet theme color
sheet-theme-color.hint: Applies to sheets for player characters and vehicles.

hide-gm-avatar-when-secret.hint: Hides avatars whenever GM rolls secret/private rolls.
hide-gm-avatar-when-secret.name: Hide avatar when secret?

hide-avatar-when-token-hidden.hint: Hides avatars when the speaker token is hidden.
hide-avatar-when-token-hidden.name: Hide avatar when token is hidden?

avatar-reacts-to-degree-of-success.hint: A critical success will glow green, and a critical failure becomes muted and dark.
avatar-reacts-to-degree-of-success.name: Avatar reacts to critical rolls?

avatar-source.hint: Adds an avatar to chat messages.
avatar-source.name: Chat avatars

use-user-avatar.hint: Configure user avatars by right-clicking users in the lower left area of Foundry.
use-user-avatar.name: Use user avatar as fallback?

misc.name: Miscellaneous Settings
misc.label: Configure Misc. Settings
misc.hint: Configure settings related to other Dorako UI functionality.

enable-debug-mode.name: Enable debug mode?
enable-debug-mode.hint: Adds buttons to quickly swap Sheet theme

customization.name: Customization
customization.hint: Make personalized changes using custom CSS, or opt out of certain Dorako UI styling.

excluded-applications.name: Excluded applications
excluded-applications.hint: Look in logs for the name of the Application, or ask on Discord.

custom-css.name: Custom CSS
custom-css.hint: Write CSS in an external editor and paste it in here.

chatlog-notify-seconds.name: Chat notification duration
chatlog-notify-seconds.hint: Amount of seconds to show new chat messages.

chat-merge.hint: Merges messages sent in a rapid sequence together to save space.
chat-merge.name: Enable chat merge?

external-module.name: External Module Settings
external-module.hint: Adjustments for how other modules are affected by Dorako UI.

colorize-idle-hud.name: Colorize PF2e HUD?
colorize-idle-hud.hint: Applies a colorized theme to the icons in the main tooltip and persistent HUD.
